description:
The Winamp source code is now open, but it has nothing to do with open source, and the company’s approach raises many ethical questions.

The post Winamp Releases Source Code, but Don’t Rush to Rejoice appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Winamp Releases Source Code, but Don’t Rush to Rejoice

description:
KaOS 2024.09 arrives with KDE Plasma 6.1.5, updated installer, and new apps like Zed editor. Dolphin and Konsole get enhancements.

The post KaOS Linux 2024.09 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KaOS Linux 2024.09 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
What do you do when you own a handheld gaming device that you really wish was a Steam Deck? You install SteamFork on it, that’s what you do.

The post Fuduntu’s Founder Returns to Scratch Another Itch With SteamFork appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Fuduntu’s Founder Returns to Scratch Another Itch With SteamFork

description:
KaOS Linux 2024.09 is here two months after KaOS Linux 2024.07 and ships with the latest KDE software, including the KDE Plasma 6.1.5 desktop environment, as well as the KDE Gear 24.08.1 and KDE Frameworks 6.6 software suites, all built using the Qt 6.7.2 open-source application framework.

The post KaOS Linux 2024.09 Adds Calligra as Default Office Suite, Improves Installation appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KaOS Linux 2024.09 Adds Calligra as Default Office Suite, Improves Installation

description:

title: When to Use apt clean, apt autoclean, and apt autoremove

description:

title: OpenSSH 9.9 Features Enhanced Quantum-Resistant Algorithms

description:

description:

description:
Valkey 8.0, an open-source in-memory data store, promises superior performance, handling up to 1.2 million queries per second.

title: Valkey 8.0 Launches with Promising Enhancements in Speed and Efficiency
